MemberSignature.Value: Protected ReadOnly Property SyncRoot As Object
protected: property System::Object ^ SyncRoot { System::Object ^ get(); };

summary.span: The property contains an object that can be used to synchronize access to the .

span.span: The property contains an object that can be used to synchronize access to the .

value.span: 可用以同步存取 的物件。

span.span: An object that can be used to synchronize access to the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在衍生的類別可以提供的同步的版本使用屬性。Derived classes can provide synchronized versions of the using the property. 同步處理的程式碼必須執行作業的中，不要直接依賴。The synchronizing code must perform operations on the of the , not directly on the . 如此可確保衍生自其他物件的集合可以正常運作，This ensures proper operation of collections that are derived from other objects. 具體來說，它會維護適當的同步處理的其他執行緒可能同時修改物件。Specifically, it maintains proper synchronization with other threads that might be simultaneously modifying the object.
